message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is already a steal for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I am still only able to offer $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I need to get a fair price for this product.  Perhaps $12,000 would work?
Hello Alice, I've reviewed my budget again and I'm still unable to go beyond $10,000 for the product. I hope this meets your needs.
